languages.text:
"Страха не ведал Ульфар, что широкий размах
Удара его заденет союзни{mf|ка|цу} краем.
Бил он нещадно, и тяжкие взмахи его
Алую рунную вязь на снегах прочертили.

"Ulfar held no fear
that his strike broadly sweeping
his ally would catch
in a glancing blow.
He fought mercilessly,
his heavy swings scribing
scarlet runes upon the snow.
languages.original_text:

languages.text:
「ウルファーは恐れを抱かなかった
彼の一撃を
味方が受け止めると
信じていた。
彼は容赦なく戦い
その重い一撃を放つたびに
雪の上に深紅のルーンが刻まれた。
languages.original_text:
"Ulfar held no fear
that his strike broadly sweeping
his ally would catch
in a glancing blow.
He fought mercilessly,
his heavy swings scribing
scarlet runes upon the snow.

彼の一撃を
味方が受け止めると
信じていた。
彼は容赦なく戦い
その重い一撃を放つたびに
雪の上に深紅のルーンが刻まれた。

languages.text:
“乌尔法毫无畏惧地
横扫千军，
他的盟友默契地
从旁掩护。
他无情地挥舞着
手中的重剑，
在白雪中留下殷红的印记。”
languages.original_text:
"Ulfar held no fear
that his strike broadly sweeping
his ally would catch
in a glancing blow.
He fought mercilessly,
his heavy swings scribing
scarlet runes upon the snow.

横扫千军，

从旁掩护。
他无情地挥舞着
手中的重剑，
在白雪中留下殷红的印记。”

languages.text:
« Ulfar ne craignait pas
que ses amples frappes
son propre allié ne touchent
par un hasard malheureux.
Impitoyablement il combattit,
traçant de ses puissants coups de taille
des runes écarlates dans la neige. »
languages.original_text:
"Ulfar held no fear
that his strike broadly sweeping
his ally would catch
in a glancing blow.
He fought mercilessly,
his heavy swings scribing
scarlet runes upon the snow.

par un hasard malheureux.

des runes écarlates dans la neige. »

languages.text:
«Ulfar nunca temió
que sus golpes descontrolados
azotaran a su aliado,
ni siquiera de refilón.
Luchó sin piedad,
y sus ataques imparables
dibujaron runas escarlatas en la nieve».
languages.original_text:

languages.text:
"Ulfar empfand keine Furcht,
dass sein breiter Schlag
auch seinen Verbündeten
treffen könnte.
Er kämpfte gnadenlos,
seine schweren Hiebe schrieben
rote Runen in den Schnee.
languages.original_text:

his ally would catch
in a glancing blow.
He fought mercilessly,

scarlet runes upon the snow.

languages.text:
"Ulfar hiç endişelenmedi.
Zahmetsiz saldırısıyla
Düşmanını silip
Süpüreceğinden emindi.
Acımasızca dövüştü,
Ağır vuruşları karın üzerinde
Kızıl rünler meydana getirdi.

in a glancing blow.

traits.locale_text:
"Ulfar hiç endişelenmedi.
Silip süpüreceğinden
emindi düşmanını
zahmetsiz saldırısıyla.
Acımasızca dövüştü,
ağır vuruşları karın üzerinde
kızıl rünler oluşturdu.
